title: My phone was bugging and it turned off and Now It doesn't want to to turn on
content: So like Everything was fine as soon as I woke up,But then I opened up a app called tik tok and then when i went to open the comments on a post it started bugging and I turned it off,not Fully power off,just like turning off the screen,But it kept playing the sound from the video I was watching and now it wont turn on,Help
